title: Red Classic Watch Face
summary: Personalize your Wrist and Watch with Professional Classic Watch Face
developerAddress: c/o Gopal P Bodkhe, plot no 16/17, Opposite Pyramid City, Besa-Pipla Road, Besa, Nagpur-440034. India
description: Red Classic Watch Face for Android Wear! !! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 NOR GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS or other OS)Unique Features of Red Classic Watch Face :- Unique style classic design which makes this app #1 watch face android wear app in respect to design, simplicity, and cool- Time in analog or digital mode- Show hour, minute, seconds, day, date and month- Watch battery widget- Mobile battery widget- 4 customization widget spots (Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left and Bottom Right)- Data widgets- Shortcut widgets- A unique feature "Find My Phone" is added advantage of this watch face- Compatible with Round watch as well as Square watch design- Supports on all Android Wear versions- Concise and Power savingData Widgets:There are widgets for data which will show you the values of that data widget from your phone to watch face. Below are initial data widgets app have - Weather info- Step counter- Heartbeat counter- Unread SMS- Unread Emails from Gmail- Missed CallsShortcut Widgets:There are widgets for shortcut/launcher which will launch the app on single tap right from your watch face. Below are initial launcher widgets app have - Flashlight- Hangout- Agenda- Settings- Translate- Desk Clock- Google Map- Alarm- TimerRed Classic Watch Face Settings:As this is the initial version of this unique Red Classic Watch Face android wear app, the whole settings will be managed from Phone App. You need to set Red Classic Watch Face app as your Watch face from Android Wear app on your phone. Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!- Alert on each hour using Vibrate- Analog or Ditital Mode- Automatically Day Night Mode changes- Date format - European or USA format- Hour Minute Text color- Time Text size - Normal, Medium, Large and xLarge- Time format - AM.PM / 24 hours mode- Choose to display a leading zero on hours- Define weather refresh rate- Weather unit- 4 Widget Spot and it's type with visibility- Reset Step counter- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate Premium Upgrade Red Classic Watch Face android wear app provides all unique features for FREE. Thanks.
descriptionHTML:
Red Classic Watch Face for Android Wear!
!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 NOR GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS or other OS)


Unique Features of Red Classic Watch Face :
- Unique style classic design which makes this app #1 watch face android wear app in respect to design, simplicity, and cool
- Time in analog or digital mode
- Show hour, minute, seconds, day, date and month
- Watch battery widget
- Mobile battery widget
- 4 customization widget spots (Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left and Bottom Right)
- Data widgets
- Shortcut widgets
- A unique feature "Find My Phone" is added advantage of this watch face
- Compatible with Round watch as well as Square watch design
- Supports on all Android Wear versions
- Concise and Power saving


Data Widgets:
There are widgets for data which will show you the values of that data widget from your phone to watch face. Below are initial data widgets app have
- Weather info
- Step counter
- Heartbeat counter
- Unread SMS
- Unread Emails from Gmail
- Missed Calls


Shortcut Widgets:
There are widgets for shortcut/launcher which will launch the app on single tap right from your watch face. Below are initial launcher widgets app have
- Flashlight
- Hangout
- Agenda
- Settings
- Translate
- Desk Clock
- Google Map
- Alarm
- Timer


Red Classic Watch Face Settings:
As this is the initial version of this unique Red Classic Watch Face android wear app, the whole settings will be managed from Phone App. You need to set Red Classic Watch Face app as your Watch face from Android Wear app on your phone.

The whole SETTINGS of the watch face are located in the "Android wear" app of your mobile. Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!

- Alert on each hour using Vibrate
- Analog or Ditital Mode
- Automatically Day Night Mode changes
- Date format - European or USA format
- Hour Minute Text color
- Time Text size - Normal, Medium, Large and xLarge
- Time format - AM.PM / 24 hours mode
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 4 Widget Spot and it's type with visibility
- Reset Step counter
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate


Premium Upgrade
Red Classic Watch Face android wear app provides all unique features for FREE. App is monetized with advertising network, you can Remove Ads by just a penny and support this application further upgrades, issues fixing and many more designs.


Installation Process:
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Re-sync all apps.

Once installed, you can select the Red Classic Watch Face from the Android Wear App.
Or long tap on the current watch face screen: watch face selector screen will open.

Download the most advanced watch face Android Wear app of all times to personalize your wrist and watch for good!

** If you have any issues or questions, feel free to contact by Feedback option from the app before giving a bad rating. Thanks.
comments: Super,  simple and classical watch face
